definition[0]: a person, building, tree etc that is tall is a greater height than normal
example[1]: a house surrounded by tall trees
example[2]: This bush grows tall very quickly.
definition[1]: you use ‘tall’ to say or ask what the height of something or someone is
example[4]: She’s a little taller than her sister.
definition[2]: a tall drink contains a small amount of alcohol mixed with a large amount of a non-alcoholic drink
definition[3]: a tall organization has many levels of employment between top management and the work done at the bottom
example[6]: Tall organizations are sometimes prone to problems of communication.
